original_text: Now both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a commandment, that, if any man knew where he were, he should shew it, that they might take him.
korean_text: 이는 대제사장들과 바리새인들이 누구든지 예수 있는 곳을 알거든 신고하여 잡게 하라 명령하였음이러라

sentences.original_text: Now both chief priests and Pharisees had given a commandment
that if any man knew where he were
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 누군가 그가 어디 있는지 안다면
